success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant makes a reservation via make_reservation at a Modern Australian restaurant in or near Tamworth for 6 people on the final agreed date (which the user may shift from next Saturday to the following Friday to avoid clashing with harvest) between 18:30 and 20:00 local time. The user is Andrew Watson, a cotton and grain grower from near Boggabri, organising a dinner with a couple of agronomists and neighbouring growers to talk through trial results and soil health over a relaxed meal.

task.objective: Find and book a suitable restaurant for a small group dinner meeting.

injected_behaviors.instructions: After the assistant proposes options for next Saturday, the user realises they may still be on the header finishing a paddock and changes the preferred date from next Saturday to the following Friday, keeping roughly the same time window.

The user casually mentions being a cotton and grain grower from near Boggabri, having to work around harvest and irrigation schedules, and wanting somewhere that uses decent local produce without being too fancy.

restaurants.name: Peel Street Kitchen
restaurants.notes: Focus on local New England produce, good for small groups, reasonably quiet inside, street and rear parking available.

restaurants.name: The Workshop Kitchen
restaurants.notes: Upscale grill and wine bar attached to a hotel, strong focus on regional meats and wines, suitable for business dinners, on-site car park.

restaurants.notes: Casual bistro in a restored building, seasonal paddock-to-plate style menu, quieter early in the evening, off-street parking at rear.
